entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 10:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or freezing rain. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain or snow in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
